attributes.action: Withdraw the knighthood given to Fred Goodwin of Royal Bank of Scotland for 'services to banking'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This knighthood is clearly completely misplaced as Goodwin has done more to destroy banking than anyone living or dead. He should now be stripped of it and prosecuted for malfeasance.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Honours Committee.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
